item.title: The emperor strikes back—but Trump’s revenge and deflection aren’t public protection
item.description: Over 2,000 years ago, Roman emperors would arrange massive public salutes to themselves, surrounded by armed, uniformed soldiers and cheering crowds.

item.title: Trump’s tariffs are becoming such an important revenue source that they’re now propping up America’s debt rating
item.description: "At this time, it appears that meaningful tariff revenue has the potential to offset the deficit-raising aspects of the recent budget legislation."

item.title: Millions of Gen Zers are jobless—and unemployment is mainly affecting men

item.title: Trump is bringing in enough revenue from tariffs to cut deficits by $4 trillion over the next decade, CBO says
item.description: In just two months, Trump added another $1.5 trillion of deficit reduction in the form of new tariffs, CBO said. Still, the One Big Beautiful Bill Act...

item.title: Small medical firm plans $400 million Solana purchase as crypto treasury trend spreads
item.description: But Multicoin Capital, Galaxy Digital, and Jump Crypto are reportedly in the market to raise another $1 billion for their own Solana treasury company.
